name_original: Zombie 3: Revenge of the Killer Zombies, Part 7 (Unlimited Edition) ("Here We Go Again...") This Time, Under the Sea
description:
IMPORTANT: Controller REQUIRED for this game.

The zombies are back. And this time, it's different.
(Note: Zombies are actually friendly to the player, who is a zombie. This was realized later in development)

How to Play
You are a zombie. Run up to humans, and bite them to regain strength (you must be touching them to bite them). Your health is shown in green. You will die after 5 seconds if you do not eat brains. Your zombie friends are the same. More health = more  S P E E D. You can also sprint, your energy is shown in blue (advised: sprint in short burts. Depleting energy to 0 will stop its regeneration momentarily). Your score is how many zombies are alive after all humans have perished. Score is measured in zoms (new SI measurement after zombles was found to be too silly). 

Controls (xbox/ps)
Left analog stick: Movement
a/cross: Bite human
x/square: Sprint (hold)
RB/R1: Debug mode, baby! Doesn't give you godmode or anything, just looks real cool.
